description.value: This chime's carvings depict skulls and other grim icons. When activated, it creates an aura of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Fear]{Fear} in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] for 1 round. Creatures in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27|traits:uncommon,emotion,enchantment,fear,mental|showDC:all] save. On a failure, they become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1} (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 2} on a critical failure). Affected creatures can't reduce their frightened condition below frightened 1 while the chime is ringing. You can Sustain the Activation to sustain the aura, up to a total of 5 rounds. This chime can be used only once per day, whether or not you Sustain the aura.

source.value: Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind
